column3: I know you mean well with pulls like this, but can you please go back to solving actual issues?\n
Thanks for closing and discussion instead of merging... (not @laanwj).\n
Come on @sipa merged a similar fix for a missing LOCK indentation yesterday or 2 days ago -_-.\n
Well, sure, a whitespace change can slip through the cracks once in a while. That shouldn't be an encouragement to do even more.\n
